name: NAWA Breach (Demo)
description:
A first person horror proof of concept demo. Please share feedback in the comments and let us know if you would like to see a full release that has a far broader scope with weapons, puzzles and a unique narrative. Thank you!

[Known BUGS}

  • Fog will flash when moving the camera / appear extremely dense in some instances. 
    • (Restarting the game may fix this currently)
